definition: needle felting (craft)/piece of felt used as a pincushion
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation

sentences.english: He was on pins and needles, waiting for the test results.
sentences.chinese: 他如立針氈，焦急地等待滅考試結果。

sentences.english: Maybe work is a pain in the butt.
sentences.chinese: 也許工做讓你痛苦得如立針氈。
